reviewText: Best acting by Dilip and better half. A true classic by Saira Bano and Dilip.

THIS IS ANOTHER OF DILIP'S MOVIE WITH SUSPENSE AND DRAMA AND VERY MANY OF HIT SONGS BY THE VETERAN SINGER MAHENDRA KAPOOR AS WELL. GOPI IS ALSO PLAYED BY THE VERY MANY OF SUPER FILM STARS AS OM PRAKASH,PRAN AND SAIRABANU.
good movie, dilip kumar was great, songs are nice. saira banu was also good. the performances were nice. good movie
